title: age calculator app
description: The Age Calculator App is a web application built using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. The app allows users to calculate their age based on the provided birthdate. It provides the age in years, months, and days, considering the current date.

title: all countries details
description: Where in the World? is a sample Redam (React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS) project that displays information about countries. It allows users to toggle between light and dark mode.

title: Stadium soccor
description: Welcome to our state-of-the-art soccer stadium booking platform! We've created a seamless and user-friendly experience to help soccer enthusiasts easily find and reserve their favorite stadiums for a thrilling game of football.

title: foods
description: Discover a world of culinary delight with Foods, the ultimate destination for food enthusiasts. Our website seamlessly blends modern technologies like Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript with the versatility of WordPress to present an exquisite gastronomic experience.

title: InnovTech
description: InnovTech unifies and collaborates UCA laboratories to address strategic objectives, fostering synergy among researchers regardless of affiliation. This approach highlights focused research areas through nationally and internationally competitive teams. Comprising 14 labs and 5 research teams from 6 UCA institutions across Marrakech, Safi, and Essaouira, InnovTech's complementary efforts aim to establish a benchmark hub for technological innovation on a national and global scale.
